content.webTitle: Are you eligible to join the Rise 500?

fields.headline: Are you eligible to join the Rise 500?
fields.bodyText: Join our club: Will you have something more to show for your time at university than a degree certificate? We're looking for the country's 500 brightest and most dynamic graduates, a nationwide search for young people who are already doing amazing things and making an impact on their campus or in the world at large. The Rise 500 will be invited to attend one day at The Guardian Graduate Conference, taking place on October 16 to 18, 2002 at EXCEL in London's Docklands, where they will have the chance to hear inspirational speakers, meet Rise journalists and front cover stars and network with employers. If that wasn't enough, each day we'll be giving away one Compaq iPaq handheld computer. Tell us, in no more than 100 words, what you've done to merit a place in the Rise 500 . Give it a headline of no more than 10 words and paste your story into the body of an email message. Attach your CV, including details of degree grade (or expected grade) and contact details for two referees. Attach any other supporting material you consider relevant and email it all to Rise500@egrex.co.uk by June 30. For more details see http://jobs.theguardian.com/rise/story/0,9901,717481,00.html
